name: Rabbit vs Mole
description:
Rabbit vs Mole is an anti cooperation split-screen game. Take on the role of your favorite animal and try to complete the current objective.

As a rabbit
  • Get some supplies
  • Plant carrot seeds in your garden and water it.
  • Wait to grow and collect your beloved carrots.

But there is also a mole whose job is to spike your guns!

As a mole
  • Dig tunnels under the rabbits garden
  • Get rid of the soil by digging mounds.
  • Come to the surface to mess with Rabbit.

But believe! The rabbit has a shovel that is not only for digging!

Game modes
  • Rivalry - A standard skirmish, the Rabbit must collect a certain amount of carrots and the Mole must not allow it within a certain time limit.
  • Carrot race - The player who collects a certain amount of carrots wins, there is no time limit.
  • Time attack - The winner is the one who collects more carrots within the time limit.
  • Cooperation - This time you have to cooperate. Collect the carrots together before time runs out.
  • Sandbox - There is no goal, a good opportunity to practice.
  • Duel - Same as Rivalry but you set the goal yourself.
  • Common goal - Same as Cooperation but you set the goal yourself.

There is a tutorial in the game that will guide new players through the game-play.

Controls
  • WSAD - Move with WSAD and do actions with left CTRL and SHIFT
  • ARROWS - Move with arrows and do actions with right CTRL and SHIFT
  • Gamepad - Move with left analog and do actions with right buttons A and B or circle and cross, depends on the type of controller.
This game requires itch.io game launcher to run.
